talents.desc: Permanently gain 5 Health and 3 Mana when a Minion dies under Voodoo Ritual.
talents.name: Death Ritual

talents.desc: Corpse Spiders creates 3 more spiders over 3 seconds.
talents.name: Spider Cluster

talents.desc: Increases the explosion area of Plague Toads and the duration of your Zombie Wall and Corpse Spiders by 25%.
talents.name: Gidbinn

talents.desc: Summon a Gargantuan that guards you for 20 seconds. Deals 30 (+15 per level) damage to nearby enemies when summoned, attacks for 100 (+20 per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp, dealing 30 (+15 per level) damage. The Gargantuan deals extra damage to Minions and Structures.
talents.name: Gargantuan

talents.desc: Upon expiring, up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
talents.name: Dead Rush

talents.desc: Corpse Spiders leap at their targets and deal 25% more damage.
talents.name: Leaping Spiders

talents.desc: Gargantuan lasts until killed instead of timing out, and deals 100% more damage against non-Heroic targets.
talents.name: Humongoid
